alert.note: Alert for Upper North Platte River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued September 23 at 1:26PM MDT until September 24 at 8:00AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 8 AM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 expected. * WHERE...Upper North Platte River Basin. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 8 AM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
